name: One Way (DavidCitron)
description:
Game with infinite terrain generation. Also you can't go back. Player's only way is forward. 

How to play

Use QWEAD keys to move your cube. You can interact with Trees, Stones, Campfires, Straws, Water by using left mouse button. Usually you need to hold it. By clicking TAB key on your keyboard you will get to the crafting menu. You can scroll there with your mouse wheel. By right clicking on your inventory you can throw away items you don't need. In inventory for selecting or deselecting you need to use your mouse wheel or 1-9 keys on alphanumeric part of keyboard. And for swapping items in your inventory slots you need to select filled slot and hold left shift and press one of those numbers depending on which slot you want to change it with. Last but not least is using left clicking on slot with food to consume it.

Interactions

The most basic interaction is holding left mouse button on top of tree. Another is clicking on straws or stone blocks on the floor. You can craft fishing rod and then go into plains biome so you can fish in water. You can cook fish by using campfire in village biome.

Skin cost

  • Red skin - 300 Highscore
